```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(pacman)
p_load(rethinking, tidyverse)
d <- read.csv("Assignment3Data.csv")

```


```{r cars}

#filtering visit 1 & neurotypicals 
d1 <- d %>%
  filter(Visit == 1) %>%
  filter(ASD == 1)

#model 
glimmer(NonVerbalIQ ~ ADOS, data=d1 )

m1 <- rethinking::map(
alist(
NonVerbalIQ ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
mu <- Intercept + b_ADOS*ADOS,
Intercept ~ dnorm(0, 10),
b_ADOS ~ dnorm(0, ),
sigma ~ dnorm(0, 5)
  ),
data = d1)

#predictive prior check. 
mu <- rnorm(10000, 0, 15)
sigma <- abs(rnorm(10000, 0, 5)) #mu with rnorm. 
sigma <- abs(rcauchy(10000, 0, 2)) #mu with cauchy. 
y <- rnorm(10000, mu, sigma)
dens(y) 

#standardizing IQ & ADOS.
d1$centeredNonVerbalIQ <- d1$NonVerbalIQ - mean(d1$NonVerbalIQ)


```
